dcterms:creator: Masanori Morise
Fumiya Yokomori
Kenji Ozawa
dcterms:description: WORLD is employed as the Vocoder to analyze raw speech waveform into spectrum, log F0, and band-periodicity features during training stage, and is also used to synthesize generated acoustic parameters back to waveform at the synthesis stage.
dcterms:title: WORLD

dcterms:description: The Vocal Novel Database is a corpus used in this work, consisting of utterances read by a single Mandarin male speaker, containing 38600 utterances (around 83 hours) for training and 1400 utterances (around 3 hours) for validation.
dcterms:title: Vocal Novel Database
